about_the_game:
BEFORE YOU BUY:
"Missing" is a short horror adventure that is meant to scare the player.
Based on a true story, my game is about finding a way out of an abandoned buried cave complex after the player has entered it.
"Missing" is a storyline experience and to understand the game you have to pay attention to every detail.

STORY:
The game "Missing" takes place in the year 2009.
You are on your way to a family dinner and, as always, you take the shortcut through the forest, as the restaurant is only a few kilometers away.
As you are in the middle of the forest on your bike, you notice a small entrance surrounded by heavy stones.
You are just too curious and crawl in, not knowing if you will be able to get out again.
You find a few remnants of research that was done in this cave and want to know what is behind all the paths. Suddenly you hear a loud rustling, stones rumble down the entrance and the shaking is like an earthquake, suddenly the daylight disappears.
Now you have to find a way out and keep calm. You will come across many dead ends, you will have to suppress your claustrophobia and you will follow hundreds of paths.
You have disappeared in a huge labyrinth of stones.
You are reported missing reported..

DESIGN AND GRAPHICS:
This game was programmed in the view of a cell phone camera, a 9:16 resolution, to provide a realistic experience.
The game and the levels were presented as gloomy, dark and foggy.
I also pay a lot of attention to the sound design, which is why "Missing" is characterized by a low frequency in the background.
The slight rustling of the shoes in the dirt and the camera shaking caused by the adrenaline and fear gives the game a unique experience.

IMPORTANT, PLEASE READ:
"Missing" contains jump scares, both visual and auditory.
The game contains NO phobic elements, except for claustrophobia.
Not suitable for pregnant women, children under 16 or adults over 85 according to professional assessments.

CONTENT & FEATURES:

- Atmospheric gaming experience
- An insight into an event based on true events
- You can explore a cave as it is in real life

name: Missing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10+(64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10400F, 2.90GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 11+(64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10400F, 2.90GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
